seo.title: UK workplace confidence coaching
seo.description: ICF-aligned coaching for leaders navigating UK communication norms, cross-cultural feedback, and self-advocacy.

hero.title: Hold your voice while navigating UK workplace norms.
hero.summary: We slow things down so you can choose how to speak up, set boundaries, and stay resourced across cultures.

isForYou.title: Is this for you?
items: You work with UK teams and want to communicate without over-editing yourself.
You are managing up, across, or virtually and receive feedback that feels vague or abrupt.
You lead in more than one language and want space to process power dynamics safely.
You are building influence in new organisations while staying true to your values.

explore.title: What we explore together
items: Where do you want more ease in advocating for yourself or your team?
What scripts help you invite clarity when feedback lands harshly or indirectly?
How do identity, race, or migration experiences shape what feels safe to say?
What practices keep your nervous system steady before, during, and after high-stakes conversations?
How might you build allyship and accountability without over-functioning?
What language communicates boundaries without losing warmth or firmness?

format.title: Format & flow
bullets: Recommend five or six 60-minute sessions across three months, with optional voice-note check-ins between calls.
We can review recordings or scripts you bring, focusing on reflection rather than performance.
Experiments may include rehearsal, journaling, or alternative communication channels you consent to try.
We close by integrating learning into sustainable rituals and naming future supports.

items.context: An engineering lead from Malaysia wanted to push back on scope creep without being labelled difficult.
items.approach: We mapped power holders, practised boundary-setting phrases, and designed a cadence for debriefing emotions after challenging calls.
items.outcome: They held firmer agreements, felt less drained after meetings, and received feedback recognising their clarity.

not.title: What this is not
items: Not legal, HR, or immigration advice.
Not accent reduction or public speaking training—we focus on congruent leadership choices.
Not a shortcut around systemic issues—we name them and plan within your sphere of control.

cta.body: If this sounds close to your reality, you’re welcome to book a 20-minute chat.
